summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackMeet Bubble's best kept secret - Tell All Lip Balm! This adorable accessory hydrates and smoothes dry lips for a plump, plush look. The non-sticky formula absorbs quickly with no waxy residue and leaves lips feeling soft and smoochable-AND YOU'LL NEVER LOSE IT CUZ IT‚ÄôS ALSO A KEYCHAIN!
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates dry, chapped lips.Plumps lips for a smoother appearance.Absorbs easily without leaving a waxy/sticky residue.Key IngredientsChicory Root Extract is a plant-derived glucosamine that plumps so lips look smooth.Moringa Oil Esters give exceptional hydration and skin barrier recovery.Acacia Flower Wax gives lip balm a lush, soft texture.Item 2627110How To UseApply evenly to lips as needed.IngredientsOlea Europaea (Olive) Husk Oil, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mango Butter Dimer Dilinoleyl Esters/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Silica, Jojoba Esters, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Moringa Oil/Hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Cichorium Intybus Root Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Rebaudioside A (Stevia Extract), Polyglycerin-3, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Flavor.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to lips as needed.
ingredients: Mango Butter Dimer Dilinoleyl Esters/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer

reviews.headline: Cute and practical!
reviews.comments: Got this for my 10 year- old daughter. She loves it. She said it's very preppy and slay!

reviews.headline: Convenient size
reviews.comments: Good size flavor and convenient. Wish they protection wrapped it so it wouldn't have been a melted mess

reviews.headline: Compact good flavor
reviews.comments: It is convenient and good flavor but was left on my porch in sun and was a mess

reviews.headline: #Love !!!!!!!!Ôøº
reviews.comments: OMG I love this product. It's so good so moisturizing such cute packaging but I think the price get knocked down to at least five dollars cause it's a little pricey but other than that I think it's a really good lip balm. I recommend.

reviews.headline: Best lip balm ever
reviews.comments: I got it shipped whitch it did come kinda dirty (on the outside) but really cute packaging. I really like how it moisturizes with a gloss finish and isnt sticky. Personally i would buy again! Love the brand bubble and this is just another gold star!

reviews.headline: my review
reviews.comments: its very easy access i would recommend

reviews.headline: Does not do its job
reviews.comments: Its cute but thats all it is. Had to constantly reapply because it would just sit on top on my lips and not absorb and eventually rubs off. Because of this my lips started to get dry and i had to use lip scrubs to feel better.

reviews.headline: I love the balms they are so so hydrating . Would recommend.
reviews.comments: Ok

reviews.headline: I probably would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I think that it's really good. I just think that it doesn't fully make up my lips not chapped . I think I have my lips are still a little chapped, but I think that it's a really good product and I think that you should buy it in the flavor Berry.

reviews.headline: I recommend this product.
reviews.comments: This product was so good. It was the most hydrating chap stick I have ever used.

reviews.headline: Great but‚Ä¶..
reviews.comments: Hydrating lip balm; but the cap keeps falling off. I lost the lip balm now.

reviews.headline: not worth any money
reviews.comments: lip balm itself is great, but the packaging isn't. I've now bought two and can tell you it's a complete waste of $ because the lip balm will not stay secure. Feels very scammy that it has fallen off multiple times when the entire point is that it's a keychain.

reviews.headline: Omg I would buy this product again!!!
reviews.comments: This lip balm is awesome. I love bubble products!!

reviews.headline: loved it but..
reviews.comments: I loved this little lip balm but the cap would constantly fall off. it was frustrating. I ended up losing it because I had put it on my Keychain and it disappeared.

reviews.headline: Hydrating balm
reviews.comments: This balm feels so good on my lips. It leaves them feeling soft and hydrated. Leaving 4 stars because the cap easily detaches if dropped and thats gross :/ Other than that, the balm itself is great.

reviews.headline: Incredible!!!
reviews.comments: This may be the best lip balm I have ever used!! The hydration lasts for hours and hours. It feels incredible on the lips. I have been chosing this over all others for weeks!

reviews.headline: Okay Lip Balm that you will lose
reviews.comments: This lip balm is just okay, but I appreciated the convenience of the key chain design. It didn't chap my lips. However, within 2 days of buying it, the bottom part detached from the cap and now it is gone forever. I feel like I wasted my money. Don't bother to buy this lippie because you will end up losing it anyways

reviews.headline: I love this!!!üíóüçìüçë
reviews.comments: I love this product so much because the balm goes on like butter and keeps my lips soft and moist daily. When i walk around with my badge it doesnt fall off snd stays on. I also love hie the pink thing on the top can come off so if you dont meed s keychain anymore you can just have the lip balm!!! Bubble if you read this your product is amazing and i would definitely buy this again.

reviews.headline: Cute but I don't know if I would buy it again
reviews.comments: Don't get me wrong it's so cute put the lid it keeps coming off and the pink. It always gets dust and everything on it and sometimes I drop it in public by accident. People come to me and I'm like thank you but it's so embarrassing. Please make a better design and make the pink less  sticky.

media.headline: Finally a lip balm that doesn't give gross build up!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm absolutely OBSESSED with this chapstick! :heart_eyes: First off, can we talk about the design? The packaging is so adorable; it's like carrying a little piece of happiness in your pocket! The pastel color and cute little details just make me smile every time I pull it out. :sparkles:

The scent is simply divine! It's like a sweet, gentle breeze of fresh flowers with a hint of vanilla. :tulip::icecream: It's not overpowering at all, just enough to make you feel like you're walking through a garden every time you apply it.

And let me tell you, my lips have never felt better! :kiss: This chapstick glides on so smoothly, leaving my lips super soft and hydrated. It's like a little spa treatment for my lips every time I use it. Plus, it leaves the prettiest subtle shine that makes my lips look naturally luscious. :sparkling_heart:

Honestly, I never leave home without it! If you're looking for a chapstick that's as cute as it is effective, this is definitely the one. :two_hearts:
faceoff_positive.headline: :cherry_blossom: The Prettiest Chapstick Ever! :cherry_bloss

faceoff_negative.comments: I have super dry lips especially around the summer and winter time so I am constantly on the hunt for good lipbalms. My niece uses the Bubble line and she wanted to try this lip balm. So I ended up purchasing two for me and her to try out. We both agreed it doesn't last unfortunately, it's moisturizing at first but you have to reapply quite often. I would mention it's very similar to StarFace lipbalm, but that one stays moisturizing and you don't need to reapply as often. Not too bad, but if you have super dry lips I'd recommend StarFace lipbalm instead!
faceoff_negative.headline: It's not bad
